Document.name: GetCaret
Document.summary: Get a new caret from the old caret with a relative position.
Document.returns: The new caret. Returns -1 if failed.
Document.param: The caret to compare. If the position is CaretFirst or CaretLast, this argument is ignored.

Only for CaretMoveUp and CaretMoveDown. Set to true to make the caret prefer to get closer to the character before it. After this function is called, this argument stored the suggested side for displaying the new caret.
